head.title: Jews Are Caught Up In the Turmoil in Iran

hedline.hl1: Jews Are Caught Up In the Turmoil in Iran

block.p: Thirteen Jews are to go on trial in Iran's Revolutionary Court, accused of spying for Israel. Jewish groups and human rights organizations have condemned the case as a political show trial aimed at frustrating President Khatami's attempts to develop warmer relations with some of the country's traditional enemies, including the United States.

Thirteen Jews are to go on trial in Iran's Revolutionary Court, accused of spying for Israel. Jewish groups and human rights organizations have condemned the case as a political show trial aimed at frustrating President Khatami's attempts to develop warmer relations with some of the country's traditional enemies, including the United States.
